official_title: A bill to require adjustments in census population figures for aliens in the United States illegally so as to prevent distortions in the reapportionment of the House of Representatives, the legislative apportionment and districting of the States, and the allocation of funds under Federal assistance programs.

summary.text: Requires adjustments in tabulating census population to prevent counting illegal aliens for purposes of reapportionment of the House of Representatives, legislative apportionment and districting of the States, and allocation of funds under Federal assistance programs.

titles.title: A bill to require adjustments in census population figures for aliens in the United States illegally so as to prevent distortions in the reapportionment of the House of Representatives, the legislative apportionment and districting of the States, and the allocation of funds under Federal assistance programs.
